searchsize.title: searchsize
searchsize.description: During network simplex, the maximum number of edges with negative cut values to search when looking for an edge with minimum cut value.

rects.title: rects
rects.description: Rectangles for fields of records, in points

class.title: class
class.description: Classnames to attach to the node, edge, graph, or cluster's SVG element

ordering.title: ordering
ordering.description: Constrains the left-to-right ordering of node edges.

overlap_scaling.title: overlap_scaling
overlap_scaling.description: Scale layout by factor, to reduce node overlap.

target.title: target
target.description: If the object has a URL, this attribute determines which window of the browser is used for the URL.

labeldistance.title: labeldistance
labeldistance.description: Scaling factor for the distance of headlabel / taillabel from the head / tail nodes.

size.title: size
size.description: Maximum width and height of drawing, in inches

labelangle.title: labelangle
labelangle.description: The angle (in degrees) in polar coordinates of the head & tail edge labels.

mclimit.title: mclimit
mclimit.description: Scale factor for mincross (mc) edge crossing minimiser parameters

sep.title: sep
sep.description: Margin to leave around nodes when removing node overlap

rotation.title: rotation
rotation.description: Rotates the final layout counter-clockwise by the specified number of degrees

xlabel.title: xlabel
xlabel.description: External label for a node or edge

cluster.title: cluster
cluster.description: Whether the subgraph is a cluster

pagedir.title: pagedir
pagedir.description: The order in which pages are emitted

pos.title: pos
pos.description: Position of node, or spline control points

overlap_shrink.title: overlap_shrink
overlap_shrink.description: Whether the overlap removal algorithm should perform a compression pass to reduce the size of the layout

landscape.title: landscape
landscape.description: If true, the graph is rendered in landscape mode

bb.title: bb
bb.description: Bounding box of drawing in points

minlen.title: minlen
minlen.description: Minimum edge length (rank difference between head and tail)

samehead.title: samehead
samehead.description: Edges with the same head and the same samehead value are aimed at the same point on the head

headtarget.title: headtarget
headtarget.description: Browser window to use for the headURL link

tailURL.title: tailURL
tailURL.description: If defined, tailURL is output as part of the tail label of the edge

beautify.title: beautify
beautify.description: Whether to draw leaf nodes uniformly in a circle around the root node in sfdp.

overlap.title: overlap
overlap.description: Determines if and how node overlaps should be removed

lheight.title: lheight
lheight.description: Height of graph or cluster label, in inches

color.title: color
color.description: Basic drawing color for graphics, not text

oneblock.title: oneblock
oneblock.description: Whether to draw circo graphs around one circle.

repulsiveforce.title: repulsiveforce
repulsiveforce.description: The power of the repulsive force used in an extended Fruchterman-Reingold

edgeURL.title: edgeURL
edgeURL.description: The link for the non-label parts of an edge

nodesep.title: nodesep
nodesep.description: In dot, nodesep specifies the minimum space between two adjacent nodes in the same rank, in inches

fontpath.title: fontpath
fontpath.description: Directory list used by libgd to search for bitmap fonts

imagepos.title: imagepos
imagepos.description: Controls how an image is positioned within its containing node

layers.title: layers
layers.description: A linearly ordered list of layer names attached to the graph

dimen.title: dimen
dimen.description: Set the number of dimensions used for rendering

compound.title: compound
compound.description: If true, allow edges between clusters

K.title: K
K.description: Spring constant used in virtual physical model

inputscale.title: inputscale
inputscale.description: Scales the input positions to convert between length units

area.title: area
area.description: Indicates the preferred area for a node or empty cluster

linelength.title: linelength
linelength.description: How long strings should get before overflowing to next line, for text output.

esep.title: esep
esep.description: Margin used around polygons for purposes of spline edge routing

headURL.title: headURL
headURL.description: If defined, headURL is output as part of the head label of the edge

fillcolor.title: fillcolor
fillcolor.description: Color used to fill the background of a node or cluster

headport.title: headport
headport.description: Indicates where on the head node to attach the head of the edge

orientation.title: orientation
orientation.description: node shape rotation angle, or graph orientation

TBbalance.title: TBbalance
TBbalance.description: Which rank to move floating (loose) nodes to

decorate.title: decorate
decorate.description: Whether to connect the edge label to the edge with a line

penwidth.title: penwidth
penwidth.description: Specifies the width of the pen, in points, used to draw lines and curves

dpi.title: dpi
dpi.description: Specifies the expected number of pixels per inch on a display device

imagepath.title: imagepath
imagepath.description: A list of directories in which to look for image files

labelfloat.title: labelfloat
labelfloat.description: If true, allows edge labels to be less constrained in position

layersep.title: layersep
layersep.description: The separator characters for splitting the layers attribute into a list of layer names.

regular.title: regular
regular.description: If true, force polygon to be regular.

root.title: root
root.description: Specifies nodes to be used as the center of the layout

labeltarget.title: labeltarget
labeltarget.description: Browser window to open labelURL links in

labelfontcolor.title: labelfontcolor
labelfontcolor.description: Color used for headlabel and taillabel.

arrowhead.title: arrowhead
arrowhead.description: Style of arrowhead on the head node of an edge

headclip.title: headclip
headclip.description: If true, the head of an edge is clipped to the boundary of the head node

style.title: style
style.description: Set style information for components of the graph

tailtooltip.title: tailtooltip
tailtooltip.description: Tooltip annotation attached to the tail of an edge

z.title: z
z.description: Z-coordinate value for 3D layouts and displays

xlp.title: xlp
xlp.description: Position of an exterior label, in points

xdotversion.title: xdotversion
xdotversion.description: Determines the version of xdot used in output

forcelabels.title: forcelabels
forcelabels.description: Whether to force placement of all xlabels, even if overlapping

outputorder.title: outputorder
outputorder.description: Specify order in which nodes and edges are drawn

peripheries.title: peripheries
peripheries.description: Set number of peripheries used in polygonal shapes and cluster boundaries

fontsize.title: fontsize
fontsize.description: Font size, in points, used for text

shapefile.title: shapefile
shapefile.description: A file containing user-supplied node content

constraint.title: constraint
constraint.description: If false, the edge is not used in ranking the nodes

margin.title: margin
margin.description: For graphs, this sets x and y margins of canvas, in inches

truecolor.title: truecolor
truecolor.description: Whether internal bitmap rendering relies on a truecolor color model or uses

tooltip.title: tooltip
tooltip.description: Tooltip (mouse hover text) attached to the node, edge, cluster, or graph

pack.title: pack
pack.description: Whether each connected component of the graph should be laid out separately, and then the graphs packed together.

charset.title: charset
charset.description: Character encoding used when interpreting string input as a text label.

tailtarget.title: tailtarget
tailtarget.description: Browser window to use for the tailURL link

tailport.title: tailport
tailport.description: Indicates where on the tail node to attach the tail of the edge

taillabel.title: taillabel
taillabel.description: Text label to be placed near tail of edge

tailclip.title: tailclip
tailclip.description: If true, the tail of an edge is clipped to the boundary of the tail node

tail_lp.title: tail_lp
tail_lp.description: Position of an edge's tail label, in points.

headtooltip.title: headtooltip
headtooltip.description: Tooltip annotation attached to the head of an edge

label_scheme.title: label_scheme
label_scheme.description: Whether to treat a node whose name has the form |edgelabel|* as a special node representing an edge label.

stylesheet.title: stylesheet
stylesheet.description: A URL or pathname specifying an XML style sheet, used in SVG output

labelURL.title: labelURL
labelURL.description: If defined, labelURL is the link used for the label of an edge

pin.title: pin
pin.description: Keeps the node at the node's given input position

splines.title: splines
splines.description: Controls how, and if, edges are represented

labelloc.title: labelloc
labelloc.description: Vertical placement of labels for nodes, root graphs and clusters

colorscheme.title: colorscheme
colorscheme.description: A color scheme namespace: the context for interpreting color names

fontnames.title: fontnames
fontnames.description: Allows user control of how basic fontnames are represented in SVG output

labeltooltip.title: labeltooltip
labeltooltip.description: Tooltip annotation attached to label of an edge

imagescale.title: imagescale
imagescale.description: Controls how an image fills its containing node

pad.title: pad
pad.description: Inches to extend the drawing area around the minimal area needed to draw the graph

levels.title: levels
levels.description: Number of levels allowed in the multilevel scheme

center.title: center
center.description: Whether to center the drawing in the output canvas

defaultdist.title: defaultdist
defaultdist.description: The distance between nodes in separate connected components

background.title: _background
background.description: A string in the xdot format specifying an arbitrary background

shape.title: shape
shape.description: Sets the shape of a node

scale.title: scale
scale.description: Scales layout by the given factor after the initial layout

samplepoints.title: samplepoints
samplepoints.description: Gives the number of points used for a circle/ellipse node

sametail.title: sametail
sametail.description: Edges with the same tail and the same sametail value are aimed at the same point on the tail.

quantum.title: quantum
quantum.description: If quantum > 0.0, node label dimensions will be rounded to integral multiples of the quantum

remincross.title: remincross
remincross.description: If there are multiple clusters, whether to run edge crossing minimization a second time.

edgetarget.title: edgetarget
edgetarget.description: Browser window to use for the edgeURL link

ratio.title: ratio
ratio.description: Sets the aspect ratio (drawing height/drawing width) for the drawing

vertices.title: vertices
vertices.description: Sets the coordinates of the vertices of the node's polygon, in inches

headlabel.title: headlabel
headlabel.description: Text label to be placed near head of edge

dim.title: dim
dim.description: Set the number of dimensions used for the layout

model.title: model
model.description: Specifies how the distance matrix is computed for the input graph

gradientangle.title: gradientangle
gradientangle.description: If a gradient fill is being used, this determines the angle of the fill

rotate.title: rotate
rotate.description: If rotate=90, sets drawing orientation to landscape

rank.title: rank
rank.description: Rank constraints on the nodes in a subgraph

notranslate.title: notranslate
notranslate.description: Whether to avoid translating layout to the origin point

sortv.title: sortv
sortv.description: Sort order of graph components for ordering packmode packing.

group.title: group
group.description: Name for a group of nodes, for bundling edges avoiding crossings.

diredgeconstraints.title: diredgeconstraints
diredgeconstraints.description: Whether to constrain most edges to point downwards

fixedsize.title: fixedsize
fixedsize.description: Whether to use the specified width and height attributes to choose node size (rather than sizing to fit the node contents)

arrowtail.title: arrowtail
arrowtail.description: Style of arrowhead on the tail node of an edge

layerselect.title: layerselect
layerselect.description: Selects a list of layers to be emitted

pencolor.title: pencolor
pencolor.description: Color used to draw the bounding box around a cluster

edgetooltip.title: edgetooltip
edgetooltip.description: Tooltip annotation attached to the non-label part of an edge

labelfontsize.title: labelfontsize
labelfontsize.description: Font size of headlabel and taillabel

head_lp.title: head_lp
head_lp.description: Center position of an edge's head label

nojustify.title: nojustify
nojustify.description: Whether to justify multiline text vs the previous text line (rather than the side of the container).

packmode.title: packmode
packmode.description: How connected components should be packed

nslimit.title: nslimit
nslimit.description: Sets number of iterations in network simplex applications

nslimit1.title: nslimit1
nslimit1.description: Sets number of iterations in network simplex applications

layer.title: layer
layer.description: Specifies layers in which the node, edge or cluster is present

page.title: page
page.description: Width and height of output pages, in inches

smoothing.title: smoothing
smoothing.description: Specifies a post-processing step used to smooth out an uneven distribution of nodes.

layerlistsep.title: layerlistsep
layerlistsep.description: The separator characters used to split attributes of type layerRange into a list of ranges.

newrank.title: newrank
newrank.description: Whether to use a single global ranking, ignoring clusters

image.title: image
image.description: Gives the name of a file containing an image to be displayed inside a node

maxiter.title: maxiter
maxiter.description: Sets the number of iterations used

start.title: start
start.description: Parameter used to determine the initial layout of nodes

mindist.title: mindist
mindist.description: Specifies the minimum separation between all nodes

lwidth.title: lwidth
lwidth.description: Width of graph or cluster label, in inches
